snippet: The running back was injured in Buffalo’s Week 15 loss to Washington and will miss his second consecutive game.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Buffalo Bills injured running back LeSean McCoy remains out of lineup for season finale against New York Jets; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The running back was injured in Buffalo’s Week 15 loss to Washington and will miss his second consecutive game.

headline.print_headline: Bills’ McCoy Won’t Play in Finale Against Jets
headline.main: Bills Will Be Without LeSean McCoy in Their Finale Against Jets
